resources.string: Your journey towards the sword takes you down a long road. You meet farmers and merchants on their way to the local marketplace. But watch out, these are dangerous times, and knives have an easy time leaving their sockets

In a world of magic and wonders, but also war, a legendary sword is the key to peace. Your father died protecting the sword, his valor showed. Tales are told of the sword of old, stolen by a wizard proven to be a lizard. The might of the sword, can rip armies apart. Now you must get back the sword, that your fathers sacrifice was not in vain.
A checkbox to show wether or not the item is equipped
